name: Spongebob's Basics in Education and Cooking (BALDI MOD)
name_original: Spongebob's Basics in Education and Cooking (BALDI MOD)
description:
This is a mod of Baldi's Basics.

Credit to mystman12.

I have textured stuff and used some spongebob assets.

Video: 

People who are now in the game:

Spongebob = Baldi

Patrick = Playtime

Squidward = Arts and Crafters

Plankton = Its a Bully

Fred = 1st Prize

Some Customer = Sweeping Time

Mr. Krabs = Principal of the Thing
